309.question: What was the performance of their model?
309.response: {'Answer': '61.17 EM, 93.54 F1, 0.75 ED, and 61.36 GM on the Test-Repeated Set. 41.71 EM, 90.22 F1, 1.22 ED, and 41.81 GM on the Test-New Set.'}
309.answer: For test-repeated set, EM score of 61.17, F1 of 93.54, ED of 0.75 and GM of 61.36. For test-new set, EM score of 41.71, F1 of 91.02, ED of 1.22 and GM of 41.81

312.question: How were the navigation instructions collected?
312.response: {'Answer': 'The navigation instructions were collected based on behavioral graphs representing different routes in various environments. These graphs included sequences of behaviors (e.g., go out of the current place and turn) and were combined with human instructions to form datasets for training and testing purposes.'}
312.answer: using Amazon Mechanical Turk using simulated environments with topological maps
